New York University Abu Dhabi Library
Collection Le Khedive - E.D. Laurens AD.MC.041
325 Photographic Prints Collection Le Khedive - E.D. Laurens (325 19th Century Egyptian Photographs)
Green cloth-covered album (27 x 22cm) with embossed gilt titles and decorations, portrait laid-down on the cover with some mild foxing to the cover With (325) silver print photographs slotted in throughout. The album is full, with no blank spaces or missing cards.
Egyptian album composed of ethnographic cigarette cards, reproduced as small-format photographs. Adorned with a portrait of Muhammed Tewfik Pasha, who was the Khedive of Egypt between 1879 and 1892, this album probably dates from the middle of his reign. The cards are negative-developed photographs.
Circa 1879-1892
Photographic Prints Egypt Cigarette cards Temples Gelatin Silver Prints
